zh-tw.username_rule: 帳號請輸入4-12個字元，僅可輸入小寫英文字母以及數字的組合
zh-tw.username_rule_msg: 帳號請輸入{min}-{max}個字元，僅可輸入小寫英文字母以及數字的組合
zh-tw.finite_note: 若權限後方顯示【限定】標記，表示該權限會依照有開放的廳主，顯示該廳的資料；若無開放的廳主資料則不顯示
zh-tw.position_warning: 此異動將重新設定使用者權限
zh-tw.name_max_length: 名稱只能輸入{num}個字元以內
zh-tw.confirm_action_batch: 確定對選取的帳號進行修改?
zh-tw.confirm_reset_single: 確定對 {user} 重置驗證碼?
zh-tw.force_deposit_single_limit: 強制入款單筆最大限額
zh-tw.special_perm_alert: 若上層功能未開啟，則設定無效
zh-tw.show_specail_perm: 若將此權限設為關閉，將一併影響「{name}」其他權限
zh-tw.reset_user_ubauth: 確定重置 {name} 雙重驗證 ?
zh-tw.confirm_user_ubauth_enable: 確定啟用 {name} 雙重驗證 ?
zh-tw.confirm_user_ubauth_disable: 確定停用 {name} 雙重驗證 ?
zh-tw.confirm_domain_ubauth_enable: 確定啟用 {name} 該廳 UB Auth ?
zh-tw.confirm_domain_ubauth_disable: 確定停用 {name} 該廳 UB Auth ?
zh-tw.no_perm_influences_info: 若{name}該功能未開啟，則設定無效
zh-tw.perm_factor_note: 黃色勾選項目為上層功能附加的選單權限，若上層未開啟則無法針對該項目異動
zh-tw.general_msg_2: 已是最高管理者的廳主子帳號，可下放其他廳主子帳號為「最高管理者」的權限
zh-tw.general_msg_3: 允許廳主將其他廳主子帳號權限比照廳主帳號
zh-tw.domain_permission_note_2: 若權限後方顯示【最高權限】標記，表示該權限只能開放給最高管理者
zh-tw.general_msg_4: 勾選後，下方權限設定將新增「最高權限」項目，並比照廳主帳號，異動為全選
zh-tw.audit_amount_description: 可審金額＝審核借款申請金額，僅計算通過的
zh-tw.borrow_bei_max_amount_cannot_less_then_m: 借唄-可審金額單筆上限不可小於下限
zh-tw.single_audit_max_cannot_less_then_min: 單筆上限不可小於下限
zh-tw.single_audit_min_cannot_over_max: 單筆下限不可大於上限
zh-tw.perm_affect_alert_special: 將滑鼠移至特殊權限上，可於【？】圖示，查看影響的功能

zh-cn.username_rule: 帐号请输入4-12个字元，仅可输入小写英文字母以及数字的组合
zh-cn.username_rule_msg: 帐号请输入{min}-{max}个字元，仅可输入小写英文字母以及数字的组合
zh-cn.finite_note: 若权限后方显示【限定】标记，表示该权限会依照有开放的厅主，显示该厅的资料；若无开放的厅主资料则不显示
zh-cn.position_warning: 此异动将重新设定使用者权限
zh-cn.name_max_length: 名称只能输入{num}个字元以内
zh-cn.confirm_action_batch: 确定对选取的帐号进行修改?
zh-cn.confirm_reset_single: 确定对 {user} 重置验证码?
zh-cn.force_deposit_single_limit: 强制入款单笔最大限额
zh-cn.special_perm_alert: 若上层功能未开启，则设定无效
zh-cn.show_specail_perm: 若将此权限设为关闭，将一并影响「{name}」其他权限
zh-cn.reset_user_ubauth: 确定重置 {name} 双重验证 ?
zh-cn.confirm_user_ubauth_enable: 确定启用 {name} 双重验证 ?
zh-cn.confirm_user_ubauth_disable: 确定停用 {name} 双重验证 ?
zh-cn.confirm_domain_ubauth_enable: 确定启用 {name} 该厅 UB Auth ?
zh-cn.confirm_domain_ubauth_disable: 确定停用 {name} 该厅 UB Auth ?
zh-cn.no_perm_influences_info: 若{name}该功能未开启，则设定无效
zh-cn.perm_factor_note: 黄色勾选项目为上层功能附加的选单权限，若上层未开启则无法针对该项目异动
zh-cn.general_msg_2: 已是最高管理者的厅主子帐号，可下放其他厅主子帐号为「最高管理者」的权限
zh-cn.general_msg_3: 允许厅主将其他厅主子帐号权限比照厅主帐号
zh-cn.domain_permission_note_2: 若权限后方显示【最高权限】标记，表示该权限只能开放给最高管理者
zh-cn.general_msg_4: 勾选后，下方权限设定将新增「最高权限」项目，并比照厅主帐号，异动为全选
zh-cn.audit_amount_description: 可审金额＝审核借款申请金额，仅计算通过的
zh-cn.borrow_bei_max_amount_cannot_less_then_m: 借呗-可审金额单笔上限不可小于下限
zh-cn.single_audit_max_cannot_less_then_min: 单笔上限不可小于下限
zh-cn.single_audit_min_cannot_over_max: 单笔下限不可大于上限
zh-cn.perm_affect_alert_special: 将滑鼠移至特殊权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能

en.username_rule: Please input username at least 4-12 characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
en.username_rule_msg: Account must be {min}~{max} characters and only can have small letters and numbers.
en.finite_note: If the “Limited” sign is displayed after the authority, it means that the information of the hall will be displayed according to the owner who is opened. If the owner is not opened, the information won’t be displayed.
en.position_warning: This change will reset the user’s authority.
en.name_max_length: Name can only have up to {num} characters.
en.alias_rule_msg: Name can only have up to {num} characters.
en.confirm_action_batch: Do you want to modify the select account(s)?
en.confirm_reset_single: 确定对 {user} 重置验证码?
en.force_deposit_single_limit: Maximum limit of per forced deposit
en.special_perm_alert: if the previous layer function is not opened, the setting is invalid.
en.show_specail_perm: If close this authority, “{name}” will also be affected.
en.reset_user_ubauth: Do you want to reset {name}’s 2-step verification?
en.confirm_user_ubauth_enable: Do you want to turn on {name}’s 2-step verification?
en.confirm_user_ubauth_disable: Do you want to turn off {name}’s 2-step verification?
en.confirm_domain_ubauth_enable: Do you want to activate UB Auth in {name} ?
en.confirm_domain_ubauth_disable: Do you want to deactivate UB Auth in {name} ?
en.no_perm_influences_info: If {name} is not opened, the setting is invalid.
en.perm_factor_note: The yellow checked item is the upper layer function added to the menu authority. If the upper layer is not opened, this item cannot be changed.
en.setting_online_transfer_note: Set value 0: No deposit and withdrawal
en.general_msg_2: It’s already the owner sub-account of the highest administrator. You can release the authority of the “highest administrator” to other owner sub-accounts.
en.general_msg_3: 允许厅主将其他厅主子帐号权限比照厅主帐号
en.domain_permission_note_2: If the “Highest Authority” is displayed behind the authority, it means that the authority can only be opened to the highest administrator.
en.general_msg_4: After completed the selections, the following authority settings will add “Highest Authority” and follow the owner account which is selected all.
en.audit_amount_description: Audit Amount – Audit the applying loan amount. Only accept the approved applications.
en.min_audit_amount_greater_then_max_audit_: The minimum single audit amount is greater than the maximum single audit amount.
en.max_audit_amount_less_then_min_audit_amo: The maximum single audit amount is less than the minimum single audit amount.
en.borrow_bei_max_amount_cannot_less_then_m: Jie Bei – The maximum single audit amount cannot be less than the minimum single audit amount.
en.single_audit_max_cannot_less_then_min: The maximum single audit amount cannot be less than the minimum single audit amount.
en.single_audit_min_cannot_over_max: The minimum single audit amount cannot be greater than the maximum single audit amount.
en.perm_affect_alert_special: 将滑鼠移至特殊权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能

ja.show_specail_perm: この権限を無効にしたら、「{name}」の他の権限に影響します
ja.reset_user_ubauth: {name} の2段階認証をリセットしますか？
ja.confirm_user_ubauth_enable: {name} の2段階認証を有効にしますか？
ja.confirm_user_ubauth_disable: {name} の2段階認証を無効にしますか？

ja.confirm_domain_ubauth_disable: ウェブサイト {name} のUB Authを無効にするか

ja.general_msg_2: It’s already the owner sub-account of the highest administrator. You can release the authority of the “highest administrator” to other owner sub-accounts.

ja.audit_amount_description: 審査可能金額＝借入金額を審査されます

ja.max_audit_amount_less_then_min_audit_amo: 一回金額の限度額の範囲内で入力してください
ja.borrow_bei_max_amount_cannot_less_then_m: ローン-審査可能金額は上限金額が下限金額を超えることが必要です
ja.single_audit_max_cannot_less_then_min: 一回金額は上限金額が下限金額を超えることが必要です

ko.username_rule: Please input username at least 4-12 characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
ko.username_rule_msg: 아이디는 {min}-{max}자를 입력하시며 소문자 및 숫자의 조합만 한합니다.
ko.finite_note: 관리자 권한뒤에【한정】표식이 있으면 페이지정보를 볼 수 있습니다. 없으면 페이지정보를 볼 수 없습니다
ko.position_warning: 해당 변경은 사용자 권한을 초기화시킬 겁니다.
ko.confirm_reset_single: 确定对 {user} 重置验证码?
ko.special_perm_alert: 위층 기능을 키지 않으면 설정이 무효입니다
ko.show_specail_perm: 이 권한을 폐쇄로 설정하면 {name}의 다른 권한에 영향을 미칩니다
ko.no_perm_influences_info: {name} 기능이 사용되지 않을 시 설정은 유효하지 않습니다.
ko.perm_factor_note: 노란색 체크 항목은 관리자의 추가 관한입니다.관리자가 기능을 키지 않으면 변경 불가능합니다.
ko.general_msg_2: 이미 최고 관리자가 된 홀 오너 자계정은 다른 홀 어너 계정에게 「최고관리자」의 권한을 부여할 수 있습니다
ko.general_msg_3: 允许厅主将其他厅主子帐号权限比照厅主帐号
ko.domain_permission_note_2: 권한 관리의 옆에 【최고 권한】을 표시되면 최고 관리자에게만 허용한 권한인 뜻입니다.
ko.general_msg_4: 체크 후 아래쪽 권한 설정에 「최고 권한」 항목이 추가되며 홀 오너 계정을 참조하여 변동 경우 즉 전체 선택입니다.
ko.audit_amount_description: 심사가능 한도＝대출신청한 금액을 심사하며 오직 통과한 금액만 정산합니다.
ko.borrow_bei_max_amount_cannot_less_then_m: 지에베이-심사가능 한도에 단 건의 상한이 하한보다 작으면 안 됩니다.
ko.single_audit_max_cannot_less_then_min: 단 건의 상한이 하한보다 작으면 안 됩니다.
ko.single_audit_min_cannot_over_max: 단 건의 하한이 상한보다 크면 안 됩니다.
ko.perm_affect_alert_special: 将滑鼠移至特殊权限上，可于【？】图示，查看影响的功能

vi.general_msg_4: Sau khi kiểm tra, mục 「Đặc quyền cao nhất」 sẽ được thêm vào cài đặt quyền bên dưới, và so sánh với tài khoản chính của hội trường, và thay đổi là chọn tất cả
